name: Desync'd
description:
Control multiple characters through multiple levels, all at the same time with the same keys!

I mean have you ever watched a "all levels with the same inputs" TAS before? It's basically that but wrapped into a very proof-of-concept feeling game :)

Controls: A and D keys to move left and right, space to jump, Alt+Enter to toggle fullscreen, and R to restart the current level.
